FILE: cm094095v11.0.txt
DYAD: COSTA RICA - PANAMA
RIVALRY: RIV246
DISPUTE(S): MID158 
RIVALRY: RIV247
DISPUTE(S): MID2770 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170719
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170729

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID158 

TERRMID: MID158 1 -- territorial MID
TERRMID-CER: MID158 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID158 from MID-B data, this MID occurred February-December 1921. From NYT 3/1/1921, Panama and Costa Rica disputed territory, mostly involving a small town called Coto. Here, Costa Rica occupied the disputed town, and Panama responded with force, leaving dead on both sides. Coded territorial MID because the disputed territory led to this MID. 

TERRLINK: MID158 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID158 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID158 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID158 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID158 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID158 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID158 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID158 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID158 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID158 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID158 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID158 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID158 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID158 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


MID2770 

TERRMID: MID2770 1 -- territorial MID
TERRMID-CER: MID2770 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2770 from MID-B data, this MID occurred 9/9/1988-10/11/1988. From Gibler, Miller, and Little (2016), this is a border clash that occurred along the disputed border between Panama and Costa Rica. Coded territorial MID because the border was disputed and contributed to this MID directly.

TERRLINK: MID2770 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2770 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2770 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2770 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2770 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2770 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2770 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2770 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2770 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2770 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2770 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2770 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2770 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2770 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
